org.agilewiki.jactor2.modules.transactions

Class TransactionAReq<CHANGE_MANAGER extends java.lang.AutoCloseable,IMMUTABLE_STATE,IMMUTABLE_CHANGES>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.requests.AsyncRequest<java.lang.Void>
      • org.agilewiki.jactor2.modules.transactions.TransactionAReq<CHANGE_MANAGER,IMMUTABLE_STATE,IMMUTABLE_CHANGES>
  • Type Parameters:
    CHANGE_MANAGER - Used when processing a transaction to update the state.
    IMMUTABLE_STATE - The type of state.
    IMMUTABLE_CHANGES - The transaction changes passed to the subscribers of the validation and change RequestBus instances.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    AsyncResponseProcessor<java.lang.Void>, Request<java.lang.Void>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PropertiesTransactionAReq

    public abstract class TransactionAReq<CHANGE_MANAGER extends java.lang.AutoCloseable,IMMUTABLE_STATE,IMMUTABLE_CHANGES>
extends AsyncRequest<java.lang.Void>

    An AsyncRequest for processing transactions.

    One of the update methods must be overridden or the transaction will throw an UnimplementedOperationException.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected TransactionAReq(CommonReactor _updateReactor, TransactionProcessor<CHANGE_MANAGER,IMMUTABLE_STATE,IMMUTABLE_CHANGES> _transactionProcessor)
      Create a transaction request.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void processAsyncRequest()
      The processAsyncRequest method will be invoked by the target Reactor on its own thread when the AsyncRequest is dequeued from the target inbox for processing.
      protected void update(CHANGE_MANAGER _contentManager)
      Updates the change manager.
      protected void update(CHANGE_MANAGER _contentManager, AsyncResponseProcessor<java.lang.Void> _asyncResponseProcessor)
      Updates the change manager.

                          TransactionProcessor<CHANGE_MANAGER,IMMUTABLE_STATE,IMMUTABLE_CHANGES> _transactionProcessor)
        Create a transaction request.
        Parameters:
        _updateReactor - The reactor to be used when updating the change manager.
        _transactionProcessor - The transaction processor to be used.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        protected void update(CHANGE_MANAGER _contentManager)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Updates the change manager. By default, this method simply throws an UnsupportedOperationException.
        Parameters:
        _contentManager - The change manager to be updated by the transaction.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - Thrown by default.
        java.lang.Exception

      • update

        protected void update(CHANGE_MANAGER _contentManager,
                      AsyncResponseProcessor<java.lang.Void> _asyncResponseProcessor)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Updates the change manager. By default, this method simply calls the update(CHANGE_MANAGER) method.
        Parameters:
        _contentManager - The change manager to be updated by the transaction.
        _asyncResponseProcessor - The response processor to be used when the change is complete.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - Thrown by default.
        java.lang.Exception
